item.title: [317] Help with donator/pk
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

Hello i need help with this, i made it so everytime on my server you pk someone you get a key ( if your a donator), well this is the code i made

if (PkPoints > 1 && playerRights >= 1 || manager.getRightsForName(playerName).getType() > 0) { addItem(989, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting " + PkPoints + " kills! You are rewarded 1 Crystal key"); }

Now every time someone who isn’t a donator kills someone the player who got killed just stands there and doesn’t teleport home, and they have to hit ::home to move because they cant even move, oh and their items do drop.

Read full topic
